Title: Systems Potentially Affected by Lupus
Description: This illustration shows the body systems that are potentially affected by lupus. These are the nervous (central), opthalmologic, dermatologic, hematologic, cardiopulmonary, renal, gastrointestinal, and musculoskeletal systems.
Credit line: NIH, National Institute of Arthritis and Musculoskeletal and Skin Diseases
Keywords: Lupus, Eyes, Central Nervous System, Skin, Cardiovascular System, Gastrointestinal Tract, Musculoskeletal System
